body_html: @zhedongzheng: I haven't seen many variants of it though. Apart from that discussion on the regularization (things we can include as parameters I guess), the tensor2tensor implementation can be seen as the default one.
body_text: @zhedongzheng: I haven't seen many variants of it though. Apart from that discussion on the regularization (things we can include as parameters I guess), the tensor2tensor implementation can be seen as the default one.
body: @zhedongzheng: I haven't seen many variants of it though. Apart from [that discussion](https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/blob/master/fairseq/models/transformer.py#L362-L371) on the regularization (things we can include as parameters I guess), the tensor2tensor implementation can be seen as the default one.
